Command processes the prompts and gives you the most relevant responses. 

I will respond to your queries in the same language you use, as I am trained to be multilingual. Command detects the language in your query and generates responses in the same language.

I'm fluent in numerous languages, including English, Hindi, Tamil, and many more! Feel free to ask me a question or have a conversation in any of these languages, and I'll respond promptly while maintaining a friendly tone.
